description: This file defines configuration utilities for the finance backend project, providing functions to retrieve environment variables and application settings, specifically focusing on database connection settings.

methods.name: str|None get_env(key: str, default: str | None = None)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable value with an optional default.

methods.name: dict get_settings()
methods.description: Returns application settings loaded from environment variables, primarily database connection URL.

ctags.name: get_env
ctags.pattern: /^def get_env(key: str, default: str | None = None) -> str | None:$/
